title: Typeface used on Mein Kampf book jacket
content:
Does anyone know what typeface has been used on the Mein Kampf book jacket that is pictured on [wikipedia](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307122924/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Image:Ac.meinkampf.jpg), and where I can get it?

Regards,  
E
author: eivind80

comments.content:
Probably hand-drawn. [Deiter Steffmann](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307122924/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/) might have something similar.

- Lex
